alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Essex; Lancaster; Middlesex; Northumberland; Richmond; Western Essex; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 7:29AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTH CENTRAL MIDDLESEX...NORTHWESTERN KING AND QUEEN...NORTHUMBERLAND...RICHMOND...EAST CENTRAL CAROLINE... SOUTHERN WESTMORELAND...ESSEX AND LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 728 AM EST, an area of snow showers was located near Tappahannock. Movement was east southeast at 35 mph. Visibilities will quickly drop to less than one mile in the heavier snow showers. In addition, snow may coat the ground and cause slippery conditions on area roadways with temperatures below freezing. Locations impacted include... Tappahannock, Warsaw, Kilmarnock, Bowling Green, Montross, Champlain, Fair Port, Milford, Robley, Callao, Lancaster, White Stone, Kinsale, Loretto, Farnham, Millers Tavern, Newtown, Newland, Dunnsville and Sharps. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Eastern Essex; Lancaster; Middlesex; Northumberland; Richmond; Western Essex; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland
